name: Create new to-dos in Habitica from new tasks in Todoist
description:
Every time a new task is created in Todoist, a new to-do task will be created in Habitica.

The template is creating the new to-dos in Habitica without frequency. If you need frequencies, you will need to prepare mapping between frequency values in Habitica and recurrence values in Todoist depending on your use case. You can do this after you are done setting up this template.
